name: Dimenseum
description:
Help out a struggling museum by visiting a few otherworldly places without ripping reality apart.

Warning:

Contains loud noises and unsettling environments.

FEATURING 

A cool 5 minutes of play time 

2 silky smooth endings

Rad music I found online

Complete and utter loneliness   :( 

A totally cool museum   :)

Created using Gamemaker Studio

Hey y'all! I really hope you enjoy this (even a little)!! I might make some more games in the future.

P.S. The music was obtained online on various sites. If you're the owner/recorder of any of the music, feel free to message me and i'll gladly remove or replace it.
